崥崥崥

崥字的基本解释

崥
pí
〔崥崹（
t?）〕（山势）渐趋平缓，如“既乃琼巘嶒崚，金岸崥崥。”

崥
bǐ
〔峡崥〕山脚，如“崔嵬不崩，赖彼崥崥。”
两石中间。

崥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pí］
［《廣韻》部迷切，平齊，並。］
见“崥崹”。
[②]［bǐ］
［《廣韻》并弭切，上紙，幫。］
见“岟崥”。

崥字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　崥； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页315第01
【廣韻】部迷切【集韻】騈迷切【韻會】頻彌切【正韻】蒲麋切，?音鼙。崥崹，山貌。　又【玉篇】【廣韻】幷弭切【集韻】補弭切，?音箄。峽崥，山足也。【揚子·太?經】崔嵬不崩，賴彼峽崥。【註】崔嵬當崩不崩，以有疆足之峽崥。

崥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
崥字的起名意思

暂无。

Wei
Basic explanation of words
Wei
pí
〔崥崹(
t?)] (Mountain trend) gradually flattened out, as in "Jinai Qiong 巘嶒崚, Jinanweiwei."
Wei
bǐ
[Xiawei] At the foot of the mountain, such as "Cui Wei does not collapse, Lai Biweiwei."
Between the two stones.
Wei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pí］
["Guangyun" department fan cut, flat, and. ]
See "Weiwei".
[②]［bǐ］
["Guang Yun" and cut, put on paper, help. ]
See "Baying".
Wei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　崥; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 315 01
[Guang Yun] Bu Mi cut [Ji Yun] Pi Mi cut [Yun Hui] Frequency Mi cut [Zheng Yun] Pu Mi cut,? Yin Ku. Weiwei, mountain appearance.　[Jade Pian] [Guang Yun] and Mi cut [Ji Yun] supplement Mi cut,? Yin Yan. Xia Wei, mountain foot also. 【Yangtze·Tai? Scripture】Cui Wei does not collapse, Lai Bixiawei. [Note] Cui Wei should not collapse when collapsed, because there is a gorge of Xinjiang foot.
